testimonials.name: G.A.
testimonials.text: Hogy mit tett értünk az Ádám? Megverte a verhetetlent és megnyerte a megnyerhetetlent! Lakáshitelkövetelésünk 37.000.000,- Ft helyett  9.000.000,- Ft-ban került lezárásra, a gépjárműhitelre 1.300.000,- Ft helyett 0 Ft-ot kellett fizetnünk a jogerősen megnyert per után. Becsületes, magabiztos, megbízható és humoros.

testimonials.name: Khabarakh
testimonials.text: General, I've got to leave. I can't stay anymore. I'm sorry to hear that. Well, there's a price on my head. If I don't pay off Jabba the Hut, I'm a dead man. A death mark's not an easy thing to live with. You're a good fighter, Solo. I hate to lose you. Thank you, General.

testimonials.name: Tusken Raiders
testimonials.text: All troops will debark for ground assault. Prepare to target the main generator. Rouge Two, are you all right? Yeah. I'm with you, Rouge Leader. We'll set harpoon. I'll cover for you. Coming around. Watch that cross fire, boys. Set for position three. Steady. Stay tight and low. Hobbie, I've been hit!

testimonials.name: Ephant Mon
testimonials.text: What did you have in mind for your next move? Well, if they follow standard Imperial procedure, they'll dump their garbage before they go to light-speed, then we just float away. With the rest of the garbage. Then what? Then we've got to find a safe port somewhere around here. Got any ideas? No. Where are we? The Anoat system. Anoat system. There's not much there. No.
